title: Mid/adc main looking for serious team for preseason and season 7
body:
I'm a mid/adc main but can also sub all 3 other roles. I'm currently gold 5 but are looking to play more teams than solo q next season. Add me in game if interested. 
My current main champions are Cassiopeia, Malzahar, Aurelion Sol, Syndra, Yasuo but I can also competently play all other mid laners as well as being able to play all adcs. 
Cheers guys
